类的使用
org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMethod

  • 使用RequestMethod的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.bind.annotation
    Annotations for binding requests to controllers and handler methods as well as for binding request parameters to method arguments.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.result.condition
    RequestCondition and implementations for matching requests based on different criteria.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method
    Infrastructure for handler method processing.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.condition
    Common MVC logic for matching incoming requests based on conditions.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method
    Servlet-based infrastructure for handler method processing, building on the org.springframework.web.method package.

    • org.springframework.web.bind.annotation中RequestMethod的使用

      返回RequestMethod的org.springframework.web.bind.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static RequestMethod RequestMethod.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。
      static RequestMethod[] RequestMethod.values()
      按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.condition中RequestMethod的使用

      返回变量类型为RequestMethod的类型的org.springframework.web.reactive.result.condition中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected java.util.Collection<RequestMethod> RequestMethodsRequestCondition.getContent() 
      java.util.Set<RequestMethod> RequestMethodsRequestCondition.getMethods()
      Returns all RequestMethods contained in this condition.
      参数类型为RequestMethod的org.springframework.web.reactive.result.condition中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RequestMethodsRequestCondition(RequestMethod... requestMethods)
      Create a new instance with the given request methods.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method中RequestMethod的使用

      参数类型为RequestMethod的org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      RequestMappingInfo.Builder RequestMappingInfo.Builder.methods(RequestMethod... methods)
      Set the request method conditions.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.condition中RequestMethod的使用

      返回变量类型为RequestMethod的类型的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.condition中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected java.util.Collection<RequestMethod> RequestMethodsRequestCondition.getContent() 
      java.util.Set<RequestMethod> RequestMethodsRequestCondition.getMethods()
      Returns all RequestMethods contained in this condition.
      参数类型为RequestMethod的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.condition中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RequestMethodsRequestCondition(RequestMethod... requestMethods)
      Create a new instance with the given request methods.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method中RequestMethod的使用

      参数类型为RequestMethod的org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      RequestMappingInfo.Builder RequestMappingInfo.Builder.methods(RequestMethod... methods)
      Set the request method conditions.
